sentences.en: A dope mix is prepared by intimately mixing the following ingredients.
sentences.cn: 通过密切混合下列成分,来制止漆状混合物.

sentences.en: A man asked them if they wanted to buy some dope.
sentences.cn: 一名男子问他们想不想买些毒品。

sentences.en: Athletics'anti - dope campaigners are faced with a credibility problem.
sentences.cn: 田径运动的 反 兴奋剂倡道者面临信誉问题.

sentences.en: For arrays this template is called a dope vector or information vector.
sentences.cn: 我们把这个属性单元称为数组的内情向量或信息向量.

sentences.en: Give me all the dope on the new teacher.
sentences.cn: 把新来的老师的情况全都告诉我.

sentences.en: Give me the dope on the new boss.
sentences.cn: 把新上司的底细告诉我吧。

sentences.en: He got a lot of dope from the secretary.
sentences.cn: 他从秘书那里获得许多内部消息.

sentences.en: He has failed a dope test for cocaine.
sentences.cn: 他未能通过可卡因药检。

sentences.en: I have to get some other dope before. OK? "
sentences.cn: 我得先把一些情报搞到手, 这样行 吗 ? ”

sentences.en: I'm more comfortable with them. I don't feel I'm such a dope.
sentences.cn: 我和他们在一起更自在，也觉得自己没那么傻。

sentences.en: The detectives tried to dope out why the man was murdered.
sentences.cn: 侦探们试图搞清那人被害的原因.

sentences.en: The media persists in its portrayal of us as muggers, dope sellers and gangsters.
sentences.cn: 媒体一直把我们描绘成抢劫犯、贩毒者和歹徒。

sentences.en: The police found the dope when they made the pinch.
sentences.cn: 警察搜捕时发现了毒品.

sentences.en: There was a suspicion that this runner attempted to avoid the procedures for dope testing.
sentences.cn: 这名赛跑选手涉嫌有意逃避兴奋剂检验。

sentences.en: they met to dope out plans for covering the event.
sentences.cn: 他们聚在一起制订计划来掩盖这个事件。

sentences.en: You get dope dealers on every corner.
